s: Log in to your Brand Registry account and select Contact us from your homepage, then select Report a marketplace policy violation. Amazon also provides a publicly available form for reporting alleged intellectual property infringements such as copyright, trademark, and patent concerns.

November 26, 2024 - Amazon offers multiple lines of privately labeled products. These are available on Amazon.com, Amazon Fresh, Prime Pantry, Prime Now, Amazon Go, and Whole Foods Market. t: Brand Stores: Create a brand page on Amazon for free | Amazon Ads

t: Amazon brand usage guidelines for 3-party display ads | Amazon Ads
s: Advertisements should be branded appropriately, when used on and off Amazon.com and offsite. For placements on site, usage of the “available at Amazon” logo is strongly discouraged. Ad placements intended for Amazon DSP can feature the “available at Amazon” logo or the appropriate text ...

t: Amazon is dropping dozens of in-house brands you didn’t even know it owned | The Verge
s: August 10, 2023 - Amazon is getting rid of dozens of in-house clothing brands as it faces a potential antitrust lawsuit from the FTC, according to a report from The Wall Street Journal.

t: Requirements and tips for enrolling a brand in Amazon Brand Registry - Sell on Amazon
s: June 4, 2024 - To enroll a brand in Brand Registry, your brand must have an active registered trademark or a pending trademark registration. That trademark must be a text-based mark (word mark) or an image-based mark with words, letters, or numbers (design mark) from approved government intellectual property ...
